songs.title: I Run Away
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You took your love away, too fast
Left no chance to say, "Look back"
And now I know the truth
It makes it easier
Maybe when time goes by
I’ll understand

[Chorus]
Let’s pretend, that I’ve moved on
And I'll tell myself
That life goes on, without you
Open my eyes, look deep inside
I run away
I run away
I run away

[Verse 2]
You threw it all away
So blind (So blind)
You pushed me far from you
In your life
Now I know the tears won’t lead to loneliness
Maybe when time goes by
I’ll understand

[Chorus]
Let’s pretend, that I’ve moved on
And I'll tell myself
That life goes on, without you
Open my eyes, look deep inside
I run away
I run away
I run away
I run away

[Chorus]
Let’s pretend, that I’ve moved on
And I'll tell myself
That life goes on, without you
Open my eyes, look deep inside
I run away
I run away
I run away
Let’s pretend, that I’ve moved on
And I'll tell myself
That life goes on, without you
Open my eyes, look deep inside
I run away
I run away

[Outro]
Let's pretend, that I've moved on
And I'll tell myself
That life goes on, without you
